name: Richard's Christmas Candy Mayhem
description:
A festive game featuring a young boy named Richard who is sent to North Pole to save Santa who is captured in a abandoned warehouse by an green evil elf, he also captured Santa's wife and his North Pals.

IT'S UP TO RICHARD TO RESCUE THE NORTH PALS AND SAVE CHRISTMAS FROM THE CLUTCHES OF THE EVIL ELF.

USE CANDY CANES AND MAGIC BAUBLES TO DESTROY DESTRUCTIVE TOYS, BIG WEAPONS AND THE EVIL ELF HIMSELF.

IT'S CANDY MAYHEM!!
